Reviews.Content: With full battery charge, automatic white balance not accurate, lots of noise on all images, no defined clear edges, flash good for eight feet at most,  nice featurs ie, panorama, manual instructions could be better explained and easier to apply, very portable, battery lasts long enough,  would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Not a nerdy or technical review.
Reviews.Author: Justin A. Wells
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased to be EDC (every day carry) along with my maratac aaa flashlight, victorinox swiss multi tool, crkt knife and zippo lighter. i've never carried a camera edc but thought my cell phone cam did crap pics in anything but light and very still.. so i looked around for days to find something that i thought would work. i'm sure there is better(always is) but this camera packs a punch for the size. Crazy zoom, even digi zoom is great, great video, easy to use and still has advanced options IF you know how to adjust for exacting pics. Its small enough(thinner and a bit longer then a pack of smokes) to carry in my pocket with all my other crap and not be an issue. Also has great battery life i get about a week or two depending on how many pics. If i am taking lots of pics, a concert or whatever, i get around 150 no  problem. It also does a pretty good job with pics. the mp is really great. I ordered the cam with a case logic case, 16 gb memory card. I also ordered a two pack of extended "wasabi" branded knock off batteries and charger. they were cheaper then a single panasonic battery and no changer and they are nearly double the capacity. It also does Great panoramic shots horizontal and verical. I'm very happy with it and i'm sure there are better and worse, but for the money, value, performance, ect, i cannot complain.update. about 6 months later. so i carried this in my pocket for months everyday and it was great until it got dirt inside the lens somehow. i believe opening and closing the camera lens on power make a suction and crap gets in there.(especially when its dirty in your pocket) i called panasonic and they swapped it out in a week or so. i'm still very happy!update 2 Oct 2013The replacement camera now has dirt in the lense. I attemped to use a jeweler kit to take apart and clean it, but the ccd uses some crazy microscopic torx screws. depending on panasonics response to the situation, i may never own any other of their products again... very dissapointed in such a seemingly good camera..

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dawa Dolma "Dawa Dolma"
Reviews.Content: I was very dissatisfied with this camera.  The instructions on how to use the camera are very sparse. The manual does not explain the various features. The pictures I took were not very clear or bright.  It didn't seem to matter which setting I used, there did not appear to be any difference in the picture.My IPad and IPhone took better pictures.I would never recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Bernstein
Reviews.Content: MANY features.  Not totally intutitve controls. Good photos.  Good abilty with movement and light variation.  TINY. Hardy.  But yourself a waqterproof cigarette case to carry it about.

Reviews.Title: Just getting to know how easy it is to take good pictures.
Reviews.Author: James D. Schrock
Reviews.Content: For the price I can't beat it. So far so good, The picture quality is good enough for me. For a hand size camera I am very happy with the device as a whole. I am very new to the product so I don't have a lot to say but get one for yourself!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kassandra Adams
Reviews.Content: this camera is awesome, I purchase in january 2013 works well the battery also all functions, images clear and brilliant

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Pat Davitt
Reviews.Content: Great camera for what I need, excellent macro, and the zoom is amazing. Small size makes it easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Bought for work
Reviews.Author: Darren
Reviews.Content: This camera works as advertised. I bought to use in real estate and the pics, video and zoom are plenty for what I need. I keep settings on auto and use the lowest resolution since almost all pics go to the web. Can usually get a few hundred pics and a 3-5 minute video from each charge which includes using flash as well

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Terry Ruggles
Reviews.Content: I have yet to find anything bad about this camera!! Fantastic photos. Awesome zoom. Fast on and off, Great battery life. I'd recommend this to anyone who's looking for a straight forward, great, small camera with big features. Perhaps the only drawback is that you have to get on your computer to see the whole owner/operator manual. It would be nice if it wasn't so smooth and slippery as I have perpetually dry hands and have dropped it several times. No harm done in those drops; its a tough camera!

Reviews.Title: love my new toy
Reviews.Author: happy camper
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer. this camera is so compact. I carry it in my handbag. very convenient. i am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera with Limitations
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a well made, well functioning camera.  I only wish it had a touch screen. As more and more items are made with touch screens, it's so hard to go back and pick this camera up and have to remember to push buttons to use it. Select a screen with a button, push another button to activate a mode, etc.  I like it...but.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother.  She was going on a trip and wanted a compact camera to carry with her.  I told her she should just use her phone, but she insisted on a camera.  Now I know why.  The pictures are much better quality.  Super good buy.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: Concepcion Cisneros
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted a camera so I started looking for something not too expensive or complicated, lightweight, and of good quality. I found all of that in this lovely camera. I've had it for almost a year now, and it has not once disappointed me. The pictures are all clear and once in a while I get a picture that looks like a professional took it. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Quality Camera
Reviews.Author: Katherine Coperich
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough good things about this camera. It is very easy to use and the picture quality is great. We were in search for an inexpensive camera that was compact and durable. This one has been perfect.

Reviews.Title: excellent compact camera
Reviews.Author: Sophie B. Lucacher
Reviews.Content: I have this camera always in my handbag, I'm a reporter and it delivers quality high res pictures.  The weakness in taking pictures of large groups inside with artificial light, quite impossible. Otherwise, portraits, exterior scenes are excellent.  Not fast enough for sports.

Reviews.Title: It's ok.
Reviews.Author: kayla
Reviews.Content: Not what I'd hoped for and doesn't compare to Canon 790 which is no longer available. Canon 780 was a disappointment and longevity was very short lived.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: HurleyP.
Reviews.Content: This is my third Panasonic Lumix. Not because they're broken, but to upgrade what I had. Even though this isn't a "tough" camera, it is rugged enough to withstand being dropped out of my pocket, and makes taking great pictures simple. The iA (Intelligent Auto) feature is amazing. It can turn any novice photographer nearly into a pro. Just tap the button, and the camera automatically determines what settings to use to capture the moment. Snapping pictures is quick, and focusing is practically instantaneous. It's about the same size as a man's billfold, meaning it can fit just about anywhere. If you need a reliable and small camera that takes great pictures, then this is definitely for you.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic cameras are worthless.
Reviews.Author: R. Rossier "ronniejo"
Reviews.Content: DO NOT buy this camera!!! For all the hype it is given, this camera is a worthless piece of junk, and Panasonic does NOT stand behind the product. I had mine for less than 9 months when the zoom function stopped working, which also meant the camera stopped working. When I contacted Panasonic, I was told to send it to a third party repair business,at MY expense, mind you, where they would "attempt" to repair it. Once they had "fixed it" I would then get it back. No thank you. I had also purchased the 2 year insurance package, so I contacted them-they wouldn't touch it because it was still under warranty from Panasonic. I STRONGLY urge you to go look at a Canon or other brand, and avoid Panasonic entirely. This is the second camera I've purchased from them, and it's the second one that has stopped working. This, even though I don't use them in harsh conditions, just expose them to normal use,  and keep them protected in a padded carrying case.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp picture
Reviews.Author: Ignacy Misztal
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife as a smaller supplement to our ZS20. It is smaller indeed and seems to be working fine. What is amazing is picture quality under good light. Under full magnification, pictures from SZ1 are sharp, sharper than somewhat fuzzy pictures from its bigger and more expensive siblings: ZS7 and ZS20. My wife is happy.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Parrothead
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. It still has quirks which may be unavoidable. For instance, if you move while shooting you will get a blurred picture. But it still has one of the fastest shutter speeds of any pocket camera. Picture quality is good too

Reviews.Title: Good quality with one fatal flaw - a lens cover that doesn't close
Reviews.Author: Todd Astroth "sky rune"
Reviews.Content: Some other reviewers have mentioned this as well.  This camera is the only camera I've owned whose lens cover does not close fully.  And this leads to the biggest problem which is dust accumulating inside the lens - dust that is not removable by easy means.  When this happened to me last year, I contacted Panasonic, and they let me exchange my camera for another refurbished one of the same model.  Fast forward to today, and yes, even the replacement camera developed the same exact issue - the cover does not close, and now even my replacement camera has large spots on the lens which I cannot clean.  It's exceptionally frustrating since I was taking pictures of Mt. Fuji in Japan, and there are huge black spots right in the center of the pictures.I wanted to like this camera - it takes quality photos, both in light and in dark, and it was even recommended to me by a couple friends of mine who are photographers.  But it's a shame that this lens cover issue is ruining what would otherwise be a wonderful camera.

Reviews.Title: small and easy to use
Reviews.Author: bigL
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her Panasonic Lumix SZ1.  It takes clear pictures, is easy to use, and fits in her purse.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: bollycats
Reviews.Content: I was searching for a camera for a while and this one got great reviews. I'm so glad I bought it. It takes GREAT, clear photos. I really like the zoom as it's as long as the lens I have on my DSLR. It's very tiny and easy to carry around on vacation. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My Third Lumix and still love em'
Reviews.Author: Charles "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: A great deal...the camera was inexpensive and takes great photos for the price.  I have been a fan of Lumix for sometime and this is my third one.  They hold up and work well!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for the non-nerd. Love it!
Reviews.Author: Johanne Pachankis
Reviews.Content: Very clear pictures. Easy to understand and work. Looks great. Big viewer.Not so nerdy/techy that I didn't understand it. I don't want/need the techy stuff.

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars -- Panasonic does it again!
Reviews.Author: Dan Shields
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera since Amazon offered a really good gift card credit if I traded in my 2011 model. Couldn't be happier with Panasonic as I have switched to them from Sony, which their products gave me nothing but trouble and headache after buying three, yes three (3) different cameras from them. I'm sure they make great TVs and the PlayStation is great, but they serious LACK in the photo department. Get this, you will be satisfied.Have any questions? Ask away!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera Ever!
Reviews.Author: victorious warrior
Reviews.Content: This is on of the best camera's I have ever owned.Even if you aren't a photographer this is a great camera for everything.I takes absolutely the best photos possible without having an expensive camera!It is a great size and is super portable.You can change the settings to just about anything to make your pictures the best.Would recommend in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: Cleaning the sensor is a pain!
Reviews.Author: Tania "PareoVert"
Reviews.Content: Pros : small and lightweight. The pictures are nice. Video button is separate, fast access.Cons: the colors are a bit boosted. Focus sometimes slow. I've had it for only a year, the shutter button sometimes don't work.Major con : this model was designed to make sensor cleaning impossible !! I usually clean the sensor of my Panasonic ZS8 with no trouble. So if you have dust on your sensor, you could ruin the camera trying to unscrew the screws in impossible places (unlike the ZS8).

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Edd Price
Reviews.Content: I am in the real estate business. I have purchased two of these cameras for my agents and they love the wide angle lens. In taking pictures of a house you are able to take a lot less pictures with this camera. Everything about it they like.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Nelson D. Woodruff
Reviews.Content: We have not used it much so far but it is going to be very useful to us and will serve our needs well.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Larry Nitz
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. My wife carries it in her purse so it's always handy.  Takes great photos for such a small camera.

Reviews.Title: battery doesnot hold charge
Reviews.Author: R G Bailey Jr
Reviews.Content: could not get the battery to charge, tried everything but nadda, missed last 4 days of vacation shots, real bummer

Reviews.Title: Easy to use point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Sage "Sage"
Reviews.Content: It is very delicate so handle with care. Takes hight quality pictures and Videos. I use a high grade memory card and I am also to shoot up tp 30 min. of video.I buy again

Reviews.Title: Great, until dust got inside the lense
Reviews.Author: Peter J Phillips
Reviews.Content: It doesn't look like this is a common problem, but after researching online, I found that Panasonic cameras are somewhat prone to getting dust in them. Unfortunately this happened to me within a year of purchasing the camera. You can't take the camera apart to get to the lense/sensor on this model, which would've been a good note to have when purchasing. Before this incident, the camera was great and portable. I really liked it, but I'm just stumped how dust can get in, but I can't get it out... Mu suggestion-- register your product so you can use the limited warranty just in case this happens. I never do that, but wish I had this time!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ1 16.1 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: dizzyJ
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera so that I would have a good means to take pictures on the vacation my daughter was taking me on to Nova Scotia.  When the camera came I could not get it to accept a charge despite trying twice following their directions meticulously.  I returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this Amazing, Attractive Camera
Reviews.Author: Teacup
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love this camera. The picture once you have correctly set settings n really gotten familiar with the different levers instead of buttons you can get great pictures.I've compared this camera to my Canon n I find it easier to use, better to review pics n has a very attractive color.Really a very good camera. The only feature I would prefer is that you need when charging the battery to keep the battery inside of camera, instead of having a separate container that battery would charge in like I need to do with my Canons. This might cause a problem if I wanted to charge several batteries, then my camera is out of usage! This feature should be corrected by manufacturing company, really!

Reviews.Title: Was very impressed with the quality of the pictures I took on vacation to Alaska!
Reviews.Author: Roxanne Lange
Reviews.Content: For a small camera I really got quality shots.  I will be able to enlarge the pictures and not lose any focus.

Reviews.Title: Affordable pocket size camera
Reviews.Author: Knutella
Reviews.Content: I previously owned some more expensive Lumix models that broke after a year of outdoor use, so I decided to purchase a lower end one. This one works great and fixes some of the shortcomings of the older models like the dial mode is gone.

Reviews.Title: Product was good
Reviews.Author: Anna Manousaki
Reviews.Content: The actual camera was good. Had this model in the past and was very happy with it.Not 100% sure though it was new as mentioned in the description, as the charger in the box was not original.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Ann E. Gagner
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  The pictures are great and it is easy to operate.  I would definitely purchase this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: We haven't used the camera very much, yet.  However, so far we have found it to take excellent pictures--it has met all of our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recomend
Reviews.Author: James Mecklenburg
Reviews.Content: I did extensive research on this camera and for the price the product is excellent.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Catherine A. Schneider
Reviews.Content: I get pretty good pictures with this. It's a little slow to get a second shot right away , but for the money, I get pretty good shots of my grands and whatever.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Grenier
Reviews.Content: This is a fine machine, takes good pictures.  Settings are fairly easy to access and use.  Nice and compact, fits in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Lee M Norona
Reviews.Content: This camera is so much better than the Fuji I had it's not funny. The recycle time is great. The battery charge lasts. This a camera I use for work so battery life is important. I find if I drive from site to site with an adaptor in the car the recharge time is fairly quick, I still am going to buy an extra battery with a car charger and would recommend that to anyone else. Really have nothing bad to say.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: looking 4realmusic
Reviews.Content: I love the color and the amount of optical zoom this camera has. Great value.....great product.  Using the video function is a little tricky. I was taking video and I couldn't get it to play back until I put it on my computer.  It may just be something I am not doing though!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for quick shots
Reviews.Author: Claudia G. "Claudia"
Reviews.Content: I bought this point and shoot to carry in my bag for unexpected photo ops.  If you are looking for a lot of settings, this is not the camera for you but for general use it works very well, and its small size makes it easy to keep on hand.

Reviews.Title: Wife's First Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: PAUL C. Laincz "natickindian"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to replace the last of a dying breed of point and shoot film cameras. She loves the size, the ease of use, and the picture quality. The camera has many features for the user. The Leica lens is worth the price, and the price is reasonable for this camera. One caveat: Ham-handling of the camera is not recommended!

Reviews.Title: Phenonmenal Camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce H.
Reviews.Content: Great photos.  Great response time.  The more you use it--- the better you become using all of its features.  The camera does a lot more than I can do---it is too smart for me.  Would purchase again.  Outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: ikeflo
Reviews.Content: We love this small sized camera.  It's got a huge zoom for such a little guy. The video recording does well and it has lots of features to play around with.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: Vicky
Reviews.Content: A good camera and a decent price. Easy to use. Will need to go on vacation with it for further review.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Steve Wilson
Reviews.Content: Excellent price for a very very good camera, especially for the price. Very good quality pictures. For it's class an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica DeGroot
Reviews.Content: This camera has been wonderful for my uses. It has now been passed around from not just being my camera but the whole families camera, I highly recommend this camera. It is easy and simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: SAB
Reviews.Content: This camera is as advertised and so far I am having great fun taking photo memories of my three year old and her antics. Small, easy to use and worth every dollar spent.

Reviews.Title: Good investment
Reviews.Author: Robert Kurhajetz
Reviews.Content: Have been using it for the last few weeks and we've been very happy with it so far; glad we bought it

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Titan Machinery Inc-brad Herther "Titan Machi...
Reviews.Content: So far we have noticed a very sharp image and the ease of use with this camera.  Would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Well priced good camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Douglas
Reviews.Content: I checked out a bunch of cameras online and was debating between this and a Canon Powershot.  This one was about $40 cheaper but had same qualities.  Battery life is good.  Speed of pictures was pretty good.  I made a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Lumix SZ1
Reviews.Author: Arp
Reviews.Content: haven't used it long enough to have formed a definitive opinion.  To date I would say good. If I have a compliant it would be the LED screen---common to most point and shoot cameras.  60 to 70 % of the time I can't take a picture because of sun blots out subject. Ridiculous for cameras to not have a way of blocking out the sun.  I searched  Amazon and found only one camera sold by you that offered an attachment that might work.  This was Sony, I believe, but the market, as best as I can tell, is severely limited.  If anyone knows of something that I can use with this camera that works I would appreciate hearing about it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: TDog
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera is  amazing. Takes great photos. Extremely Lightweight and comes in a variety of colors......I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: doughboy
Reviews.Content: So far so good with this highly rated camera.  Takes nice pictures and I am hopingthe anti shake feature really helps my photos.  Only think I don't really like is all the mechanical/toggle switches (power, film-photo, etc.).  Guess I am just used to push button/"digital" switches on my old Sony.  Overall, happy with the camera thus far.

Reviews.Title: Gift for mom
Reviews.Author: KatyW
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother, her very first digital camera.  It is easy for her to use and light for her to carry.  And it takes good photos.

Reviews.Title: Amateur salvation / poor endurance
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Sepulveda Duran
Reviews.Content: I bought this item to use during my vacations. I played a lot with the "panoramic" function. This product is very simple, but it does the job if you are not a professional. The only downside is that the battery dies fast. If you recharge the machine every day, it should be ok, but if you are planning to get lost in the wilderness for long you need to get more batteries or a product with more endurance.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ1
Reviews.Author: Channing M. Greene "chan"
Reviews.Content: This may be a premature rating; I have not really had a chance to put the camerathrough its paces.  It is lighter, handier and easier than the camera it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Replacing broken panasonic
Reviews.Author: Rachel Fuchs
Reviews.Content: I dropped my 4 year old lumix in the fall and decided to replace it with the newer version since i loved it so much the first time around. So far this is meeting my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This was everything I expected and more.  It's small enough that I carry it with me most of the day.  The video and zoom capabilities were a surprise.  It was also easier to figure out the operating system than I expected.  I liked it enough that I got one for my son as a present as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: William A. Celentano "Bandit"
Reviews.Content: I usually purchase Canon Powershot, but I tried the Lumix.  A great choice.  Action and night shots were crisp and clear.  My only complaint is common across all point and shoot cameras is the lack of a  viewfinder.  During sunny days its difficult to view the image, however it is rare to find a Point and shoot with an image finder.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: Marguerite Simmons
Reviews.Content: Nice camera.  It produces beautiful pictures.  Nice and compact and lightweight.  Easy to use.  Make sure you have a HD card reader as that is the only way to view the pictures.  Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAM
Reviews.Author: Martin Barcos
Reviews.Content: is a very very good cam, easy to use , notable zoom and quality image.i don't see bad things in the cam

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Ron Makowski
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife as a birthday present.  She loves it and is amazed at all that it has to offer.  She is very pleased with the size as it can easily be carried in her purse.  One of the best purchases I have made as I also enjoy using her birthday  present.  A definite winner for Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: baseballmom96 "Mel"
Reviews.Content: Lots of cool effect ! My son requested this camera he is very into video editing and photography and he told me this was the best camera for the price...we ordered and after he played with for an hour he showed me the most beautiful shots he was able to take !

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin Manner
Reviews.Content: So far camera still working. Camera does of what I ask of basically. I still should read and learn on it. I never tried video yet.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: GABYALEX
Reviews.Content: bonita, pequeña, comoda, excelente hasta los momentos de facil funcionabilidad, buena marca bateria resistente, la volveria a comprar sin duda alguna

Reviews.Title: Great point & shoot camera!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole E.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera thus far. Received it right before Christmas eve so I was able to use it for the holiday season. It's simple to use and the blue color is really sharp!I'm excited for the summer to use it when we go hiking to waterfalls. The zoom is really powerful.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Needed a compact camera with zoom. Lumix  has a nice up 10x zoom and fits in a purse quite nicely!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Happy Customer
Reviews.Content: This is easy to use.  Had great focus unlike my previous camera and is small enough to fit conveniently in my wife's purse

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kim A. Knaup
Reviews.Content: This is a nice inexpensive camera, nice and compact too. It fits in shirt pocket. overall I like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera!
Reviews.Author: MeredithTB
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so I could carry one around in my purse.  I have been pleasantly surprised with the ease of use and quality!  I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Handy.
Reviews.Author: Darlin' "auntney50"
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use this camera but I love it.  It takes better pictures and video than my phone.

Reviews.Title: hubby loves
Reviews.Author: Barbara Norris "Barbara Norris"
Reviews.Content: My husband LOVES this camera!  It takes good pictures, and is very easy to use.  He is NOT a manual reader so he appreciates its simplicity.

Reviews.Title: very good option
Reviews.Author: lenhinger
Reviews.Content: this is a very good camera, especially considering the price. I think it's the best value for money you can find.Its zoom capacity and picture quality are very good, and the software is very easy to use. i would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Camera for a beginner.
Reviews.Author: June Brussow
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be a easy to use camera.  I have only had it a few weeks and still have a lot of experimenting to do but so far it has met my requirements.

Reviews.Title: Lumix Camera
Reviews.Author: BBinbg
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my Wife and she loves it. She will be taking a trip down the Danube River next month and the camera will capture highlights of her trip.It was a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: nomad
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Nice camera.  Has all the features that we were looking for and is small enough to put in a pocket or purse.

Reviews.Title: Lumix Camera
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and so far is working great.  No problems.  Camera is reconditioned but looks and functions like new.  A good "put in your pocket" camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: K. Salemi
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and is SO easy to use.  It just makes sense.  The zoom button slides and is located on the side of the "take picture" button.  You can quickly change the zoom and then snap your picture without having to move your hands around.  I also like that there's a separate button to change from taking pictures to looking at pictures you've taken.  Just remember to check whether your camera comes with a memory card.  Mine didn't.

Reviews.Title: Quality, fun camera
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: This camera takes clear and sharp pictures.  It's easy to use and I can take pictures all day and the rechargable battery is still strong.  For a little more than $100, this camera is exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ1
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The SZ1 is very easy to use, and with its compact size for a 10x zoom camera, it's a perfect fit for the hiking trail.It takes beautiful pictures and with the scenes menu, you can choose from a wide variety of options, low light, kids, soft skin, sunset, landscape, etc.Considering the low price, this is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Luminix  SZ1
Reviews.Author: Steamer
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately the camera did not last too long during a recent trip to Florida the cameras lense stopped opening I have only had the camera for less than 4 months

Reviews.Title: Not happy with purchase of camera from Amazon.
Reviews.Author: lynnah franks
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in camera. The item on Amazon indicated it was new and when we received the camera the box looked old and was crushed. In addition the camera makes a noise when the lens is extended for the zoom. To me it appears that Amazon sold me a used camera and said it was new. Not very happy.

Reviews.Title: Defective shutter scratches camera lens!
Reviews.Author: AAyers
Reviews.Content: I've had the Lumix for a while and have been pleased with it until I recently noticed several fine vertical scratches on the lens (some are more like a dashed line ----). Each photograph, especially those where I've aimed into any kind of light source, have hazy white lines in the center of the photo. I couldn't figure out how I could have scratched the lens since the cover retracts automatically when it's not on. I am very careful with my camera and keep it in a lens case when being carried around. A little research turned this up: http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lens-scratches/forum/Fx39Y385WF8RDUQ/Tx1ZBKB3Z7Z73R8/1?_encoding=UTF8&asin;=B001T0H0RG. Apparently lots of other people have had this this issue. The scratches are due to a defect in the camera shutter which scratches the lens each time it closes. When I listen closely I can hear it making contact with the glass. I called Panasonic and spoke to Otis, a supervisor in their Camera Repair dept. and, as expected, he told me that I'd have to return it for repair at a cost of $128. He said "defect or not, it's out of warranty". And that's that. I will not be returning it for repair at that cost, of course. Nor will I ever buy another Panasonic product.

Reviews.Title: CONSUMER REPORT RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: Jonathan w
Reviews.Content: WOULD NOT TAKE CHARGE.TOOK THE AC DC ADOPTER FROM MY I PHONE AND CAMERA FINALLY CHARGED.AC DC ADOPTER THAT COMES WITH CAMERA IS CHEAP AND DEFECTIVE OTHERWISE CAMERA IS FINE.ORDERED WASABI POWER CHARGER NEXT DAY AND CAMERA WORKS FINE.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Christmas Story fan
Reviews.Content: This is a great little point and shoot camera! It has a lot of features you don't expect to find on a little camera like this. It sometimes takes pictures as good as our good Nikon SLR camera. Great for sticking in your pocket or purse so you have it when you need it.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Klinker
Reviews.Content: Bought this replace another Lumix F25 that was stolen at a birthday party.  This camera is a refurb.  What i got  was for all intents and purposes a new camera, had all the contents in the box like a new camera.  This is a better camera than the F25.  It takes great photos and senses macro situations.  The antishake system is probably the best I have seen. I would not hesitate recommending it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Bret E Jones
Reviews.Content: I can not believe this is a Leica lens.  The image sharpness and contrast is awful.  I have had Panasonic cameras before and was expecting better than this.  Taking it back tomorrow, very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Beyond impressed
Reviews.Author: Anya
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this camera!!! I've had several bad experiences with what were considered top of the line point and shoot cameras, and this one just blows my mind.  The body is sleek and sharp, the controls are super user friendly, the zoom works wonderful, pictures come out super clear even when the screen is pixlated and my biggest compliment of all is the long lasting battery life, I've had it for just over a month, and have taken well over 300 pictures and 10 or so videos with it and have only charged it twice! My only complaint is where the microphone is placed on top of the camera, as it is very easy to cover up with a finger when trying to stabilize for a clear video. Its a perfect camera to keep in your purse because it is so small so you always have it on hand for those unexpected memories!

Reviews.Title: It's OK, but it is not user friendly
Reviews.Author: Rogen
Reviews.Content: It's OK, but it is not user friendly. It is not easy to switch to video and play it. The pictures are not so sharp.

Reviews.Title: Not so good!
Reviews.Author: mike wells
Reviews.Content: I never have been able to get the camera to work!  Right out of the box, with a fully charged battery, the camera began giving error/malfunction messages.  I did print out the manual but have never called the support number listed there for assistance.  It may be ok if I can get help.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Christopher Blair
Reviews.Content: Old Kodak digital camera seemed to work better, have more intuitive controls etc.  Was dissapointed with the quality of this camera

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: laurie
Reviews.Content: this little camera does what it said it would.  Get SD card and case and you are good to go1

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Karen2 "Karen2"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera:- easy to use- high resolution pictures are sharp and crisp- includes great software to upload and manage your pictures and videosI would highly recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Wow, a real "point and shoot" that takes great pics!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Dunn
Reviews.Content: We always consult Consumer Reports before we buy anything significant. CR gave this camera a great rating and we are so glad we bought. For camera-stumps, this is the perfect camera yet does a fine job with great pictures. I had to study a bit to learn it but that smoothed out. I found it difficult to know exactly what came with the camera so I ordered other items (Waabi Power Kit) that unfortunately cannot be used with the camera (a wall charger and extra batteries). I gave them away.

Reviews.Author: Guram Khurtsidze
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Lumix SZ1 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical ZoomPanasonic Lumix SZ1 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom GOOD

Reviews.Title: This is a compact realy fine camera
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Costa "mecosmo2"
Reviews.Content: This is a compact really fine camera 16 MP great zoom I bought two one for my Daughters Birthday.It takes great picture and surprisingly great videos. It takes better than average zoom pictures also,

Reviews.Title: Picture Files aree TOOO Big
Reviews.Author: O. J. Maschhoff "A Long Time Delbert Fan"
Reviews.Content: My old camera required about 1.5 MB per picture.  If you go to 16 MP on this camera you will need 6.5 MB per picture.  I called Panasonic and they suggested shooting everything at 5MP which still results in about 3 MB per picture.  Unfortunately this size file really complicates attaching pictures to email or other online sites.  Takes forever.Zoom works well.I did not consider the size of the pictures when I purchased the camera.  Do more research than I did if you are looking for a point and shoot Camera.

Reviews.Title: Dust spots appear way to fast
Reviews.Author: Marie-Christine van Acker
Reviews.Content: I got this camera about a month ago. Since last week, all these ugly 'dust spots' (black spots on the image) started appearing, which actually ruins every photo that i take. I'm sure I didn't do any weird stuff with the camera, so I'm actually very disappointed about this happening so fast. Feels like I've trown away my money... Picture quality itself is very good, but that means nothing if every picture comes out with a bunch of black spots on it.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I had upcoming trips to Spain and Nepal.  And I got there and was unable to take photos because the camera didn't work.  It spontaneously turns on and off, and when it stays on long enough to take a photo, it is unable to focus.  The pictures that result are so blurry that you can't even tell what's in them.

Reviews.Title: SImple and effective
Reviews.Author: Pankaj
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera on a warehouse deal from Amazon for my daughter (11)She has taken to it completely and is using it from the moment she got it in to her hands.I had no involvement she figured the whole thing out on her own and is able to take very good pictures with the camera.She has also been using some of the creative framing that the camera does.Overall she is happy with the camera which makes me happy

Reviews.Title: Lumix SZ1 Camera - Don't Bother
Reviews.Author: Aubrey E Hawes
Reviews.Content: The built in memory is a joke.  And the instructions incluindg on line do not provide any information regarding memory cards size.

Reviews.Title: Thought I'd love it but......
Reviews.Author: B. Gibson
Reviews.Content: This camera has the potential to be a great camera but it developed a black spot in the center of the pictures that I found out is a common occurrence because the lens can only be properly cleaned by taking the whole camera apart!  Two friends who bought the same camera experience the same problem and Panasonic even has a video showing us how to carefully, screw by tiny screw get to the lense to clean it.  I am currently waiting for a refurbished new model of this camera from Panasonic.  The jury is still out as to whether or not they have corrected the problem.

Reviews.Title: not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Minor G. Monge "gus5000"
Reviews.Content: I find it a little difficult to use.  I am surprised because consumer reports rated this camera pretty good buy and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great pix- but lens cover sticks halfway
Reviews.Author: Richard Gregor "dg"
Reviews.Content: Rally like the images and features but after three months lens cover sticks halfway closed. tried to blow out but didn't help. Any help would be appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Angeldawn
Reviews.Content: I am looking for a compact camera that takes quick pics with good quality....this is not it.....poor picture quality and quality overall is just sad.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ1 16.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Zumwinkle
Reviews.Content: The camera is OK but using it has been a challenge that I don't like. I received the camera one day before leaving for vacation - after checking to see that everything was in the shipping box, I put the whole box with the camera in my luggage. The basic owner's manual that came with the camera only described how to turn it on and take pictures. With no access to a computer to look at the online owner's manual, I started taking pictures. The internal memory was full after about 12 pictures. It was very frustrating not to have a useable hard copy of a manual. Later, I bought the memory card recommended in the online manual and also bought a memory card reader. I have not been able to get any computer to recognize the suggested memory card - I've tried more than one computer and they recognize the reader but not the card so I can't download any pictures so remain frustrated and unhappy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Slower than expected when taking pictures
Reviews.Author: Haendel Castillo "HFC"
Reviews.Content: I own a Google Nexus 4 cellphone. It has one of the greatest cameras out there. And for sure is a lot better than this panasonic.It is absurd that a phone camera is better than a camera-camera, for me it just doesn't make sense.Zoom=Super great (in fact this is only reason for me to by this camera)Size= Excellent (I like small cameras and this is a very small one, very compact with great zoom)Speed=Horrible. (It takes a lot of time -few seconds- between pictures)->For me this is unacceptable specially 'case almost any decent phone's camera is instant when taking pictures after pictures.Photo quality=Very good, very pristine specially in good light (as all digital cameras including phone's) ... in the dark not that good (as all digital cameras as well)This is a very nice little camera with great zoom to take the far away pictures that your phone is not able to take.I practically don't use it, 'cause of having a better phone camera than this one.But i kept it anyway for the strange reason of wanting to own a camera that is a camera and not "just" a phone's camera.I would recommend it anyway for some reason I don't really know.

Reviews.Title: no hablo español
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn Bailey "Cerulean Blue"
Reviews.Content: Seriously, you sent me a Spanish language camera. No hablo español. What gives? I live in Chicago. Since the instructions are only in español and francais-- I don't even know if I can switch the languages.¡Qué fastidio!

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: gina "amonr"
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera for that price.I would have appreciated a longer batterylive and a non-plastic closure for the datatransfer.

Reviews.Title: panasonicx
Reviews.Author: Joan Grant
Reviews.Content: love this camera it does so much and is so clear and very easy to  use everyone who sees my pictures remarks what ki9nd of camera do you use??? happy with your price and when another one comes out please let me know if it is better than this one.

Reviews.Title: It is totally the wrong item!
Reviews.Author: Ming Liu
Reviews.Content: I received the item that is right out side of the box, but is totally the wrong item in the inside. It become the KODAX one.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Tain Jyue Huang
Reviews.Content: Missing battery in the box.  The box was not sealed, looked like a return or used one. I wasted my time.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: Anne W. Parrish
Reviews.Content: I found it confusing.  I'll agree that I'm an amateur, but help or instructions seemed to be for people that already have the information. It also seemed a little too small for me.  Just didn't find enough positives for me to try and figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Arrived in an open box
Reviews.Author: S. Teplinsky
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived in an open box without any protective plastic and with few smudges on the display.  Not sure if it is Amazon or Panasonic's fault but the camera is definitely going back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic SZ1
Reviews.Author: mike clark
Reviews.Content: This camera's pictures are just ok but to large. My old 5mp Olympus FE-240 takes much better pictures & there about 1mb vs This camera's 5mb.
